overview: Jenna Sativa has the X-mas spirit and is busy decorating her tree. And what better way to do that than with milk and cookies. When she gets up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom, she notices that some of the cookies she left out are gone. Hearing a sound, she storms into the bedroom. She finds Lexi Belle aka Santa Claus, sitting on her bed. Kenna James and her friend and roommate, Tiffany Watson, won't be able to go home to see their families for Christmas! The girls make the best of their snowed-in situation, doing all the fun things associated with the holidays, but in their own unique way. Whitney Wright is getting ready to leave for the weekend. Eliza Ibarra, her roommate, is excited because that means she has the one-room apartment all to herself. But Whitney returns home, her flight having been canceled. She is shocked to find Eliza masturbating, LOUDLY!
title: Last Minute Christmas
